initialize(address,address).details: stakingAddress must be initialized separately after Staking contract is deployedserviceProviderFactoryAddress must be initialized separately after ServiceProviderFactory contract is deployeddelegateManagerAddress must be initialized separately after DelegateManager contract is deployed

params._tokenAddress: - address of ERC20 token that will be claimed

initiateRound().details: Permissioned to be callable by stakers or governance contract

processClaim(address,uint256).details: Callable through DelegateManager by Service Provider

params._totalLockedForSP: - amount of tokens locked up across DelegateManager + ServiceProvider

params._newCommunityPoolAddress: - new address to which recurringCommunityFundingAmount         is transferred at funding round start

params._newAmount: - new amount to fund per round in wei

params._newFundingRoundBlockDiff: - new min block difference to set

params._newRecurringCommunityFundingAmount: - new reward amount transferred to         communityPoolAddress at funding round start

claimPending(address).notice: Returns boolean indicating whether a claim is considered pending

getFundingRoundBlockDiff().notice: Get the duration of a funding round in blocks

getFundsPerRound().notice: Get the amount funded per round in wei

getLastFundedBlock().notice: Get the last block where a funding round was initiated

getTotalClaimedInRound().notice: Get the total amount claimed in the current round

initialize().notice: wrapper function around parent contract Initializable's `initializable` modifier     initializable modifier ensures this function can only be called once by each deployed child contract     sets isInitialized flag to true to which is used by _requireIsInitialized()

processClaim(address,uint256).notice: Mints and stakes tokens on behalf of ServiceProvider + delegators

updateFundingRoundBlockDiff(uint256).notice: Modify minimum block difference between funding rounds

updateRecurringCommunityFundingAmount(ui.notice: Modify community funding amound for each round

userdoc.notice: Designed to automate claim funding, minting tokens as necessary- will call InitializableV2 constructor
